entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
